Visible design is a large part of the us: Visible design is a large part of the user experience, but so is the user's workflow, or how they interact with an app. In this section, we cover a few important steps of a typical workflow:
<strong>First-Launch Experience</strong>: First-Launch Experience: What the user sees the first time they use your app.
<strong>Normal Launch</strong>: What hap: Normal Launch: What happens when opening your app on a day-to-day basis.
<strong>Closing</strong>: What happens w: Closing: What happens when closing your app.
<strong>Background Tasks</strong>: How y: Background Tasks: How your app manages to do things invisibly in the background.
